task_name: Infrastructure: Define Cognito User Pool via Terraform
resource_notes: Requires deep expertise in AWS Cognito and Terraform to correctly configure security policies (PKCE, password strength).
alternative_approach: Manual configuration via AWS Console, but this violates IaC principles and is not recommended.
risk_factors: Misconfiguration can lead to security vulnerabilities (RISK-006). High dependency for all auth features.
mitigation_strategy: Pair programming with another senior engineer. Mandatory security review of Terraform plan.

task_name: Backend: Implement JWT Auth Guard and User Service
resource_notes: Security-critical task requiring expertise in authentication patterns and secure coding.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler auth guard, but this may compromise security or flexibility.
risk_factors: Incorrect JWT validation logic could compromise the entire API.
mitigation_strategy: Dedicated security review and extensive API integration testing with invalid/expired tokens.

task_name: Infrastructure & Backend: Implement Secure Sandbox Lambda
resource_notes: Highest security risk task. Requires deep understanding of Node.js VMs and AWS security.
alternative_approach: Use a less secure library like `vm2` (prohibited by requirements) or a much heavier container-based solution.
risk_factors: Sandbox escape vulnerability could compromise the backend environment (RISK-004).
mitigation_strategy: Run Lambda in a separate, highly restricted AWS account. Mandatory peer review by security lead.

task_name: Frontend: Implement Sync Manager and UI Feedback
resource_notes: Complex state management and error handling for network unreliability.
alternative_approach: Simplified approach with only manual sync retry, but this fails to meet core requirements.
risk_factors: High risk of data loss or duplication bugs if state transitions are not handled perfectly (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategy: Extensive E2E test suite simulating network loss. Pair programming with another senior developer.

task_name: QA: Full E2E Test Suite for Offline Scenarios
resource_notes: Requires advanced Cypress skills for programmatic network control and IndexedDB inspection.
alternative_approach: Manual testing only, but this is unreliable and not repeatable for regression.
risk_factors: Difficulty in creating stable, non-flaky tests for complex async offline scenarios (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategy: Allocate sufficient time. Develop reusable Cypress commands for network manipulation.

task_name: Audit and Remediate Core Components for Accessibility
resource_notes: Large, cross-cutting task requiring deep expertise in WCAG 2.1 AA and ARIA patterns.
alternative_approach: Remediate only critical issues, but this fails to meet project requirements.
risk_factors: High risk of underestimation and delaying the release if not treated as an ongoing process (RISK-002).
mitigation_strategy: Integrate automated Axe checks early in CI. Make a11y part of the Definition of Done for all UI tasks.
